messages.message:
Who can I talk to about How we the File Submission app has so much potential for POC's and if we slightly augment it we could have a massive benefit. A lot of our customers using Instabase.com (http://Instabase.com) ask how they can send us documents and have a File Submission App that allows me to give them a link and a repository it will dump the files into would be amazing. This is a growing problem.

Today I have to create them an account using our super weird token system and them show them how to create a hard repo and then how they should upload.
Hey! Can you send me more details about what changes you think would be necessary? We can try to put this in our Q3 roadmap.
Yes what would be the best way, writing up a small PRD?
@Justin @Jesika Haria If this crosses into your product domain at all
Updated the PRD further feedback would be great
